summary: WHILE TRAVELING ON THE HIGHWAY, THE CONSUMER HEARD A KNOCKING NOISE  COMING FROM THE FRONT OF THE VEHICLE, CAUSING  RACK AND  PINION TO GO OUT. *AK. THE CONSUMER NOTICED SLACK IN THE STEERING AND RATTLING IN THE FRONT AT AROUND 75000 MILES. THE STEERING BECAME  STUCK DURING LEFT AND RIGHT TURNS. *TS. THE TIE RODS WERE REPLACED AND ALSO THE RACK AND PINION NEEDED TO BE REPLACED, HOWEVER THE CONSUMER DECLINED THE REPAIRS.  *JB
